## PopulatableKumo.claimCollateralSurplus() method

Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption.

**Signature:**

```typescript
claimCollateralSurplus(asset: string): Promise<PopulatedKumoTransaction<P, SentKumoTransaction<S, KumoReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Remarks

Use [getCollateralSurplusBalance()](./lib-base.readablekumo.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) to check the amount of collateral available for withdrawal.
